aka: The Doomsday Cult of Antares De La Luz

cast.name: 弗洛伦西亚·伯纳 Florencia Berner

this_title: Antares de la Luz: La secta del fin del mundo
trans_title: 光之安塔雷斯：末日教派大揭秘
The Doomsday Cult of Antares De La Luz
introduction: Towards the close of 2012, amidst the widespread speculation about an impending apocalypse, Antares de la Luz, the charismatic leader of a sect in Chile, adeptly manipulates his followers into unwavering obedience under the guise of salvation. This manipulation precipitates a descent into a chilling spiral of terror, culminating in the commission of one of the most heinous crimes in the annals of the nation's history. Through the lens of this Netflix documentary, individuals who were once under his sway recount their experiences, shedding light on how he insidiously usurped their autonomy, subjugating their wills and lives to the extent of distorting their consciences and reason.
chinese_title: 光之安塔雷斯：末日教派大揭秘
foreign_title: Antares de la Luz: La secta del fin del mundo
